## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fa3ac41199a392a32d649e60da4ff9d98d6ceb0d956297d976ce3b5dc948dc91)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'sparklog' @ 0.0.3 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
